name: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
description: Build a strong foundation in cybersecurity with essential concepts and tools.

steps.title: Introduction to Core Concepts
steps.description: Understand the basics of cybersecurity and key security principles.

steps.title: Networking and Operating Systems
steps.description: Learn networking essentials and basic OS skills for security contexts.

name: Blue Team / SOC Analyst
description: Defend and monitor networks as a SOC analyst with defensive security skills.

steps.title: Foundational Setup
steps.description: Establish basics in networking, OS, and initial security configurations.

steps.title: Monitoring and Detection
steps.description: Implement SIEM and log analysis for threat detection.

steps.title: Threat Hunting and Response
steps.description: Hunt threats and respond to incidents using playbooks.

name: Penetration Tester
description: Simulate attacks to identify vulnerabilities in systems and applications.

steps.title: Preparation and Reconnaissance
steps.description: Build foundational skills and gather intelligence for testing.

steps.title: Scanning and Enumeration
steps.description: Scan networks and enumerate services for vulnerabilities.

steps.title: Exploitation and Post-Exploitation
steps.description: Exploit vulnerabilities and maintain access in advanced scenarios.

name: Cloud Security
description: Secure cloud environments with focus on AWS, Azure, and container security.

steps.title: Cloud Fundamentals
steps.description: Understand cloud computing basics and identity management.

steps.title: Platform-Specific Security
steps.description: Secure AWS and Azure environments with best practices.

steps.title: Advanced Cloud and Container Security
steps.description: Focus on Kubernetes and cloud pentesting techniques.

name: DFIR / Digital Forensics
description: Investigate incidents and perform digital forensics for response.

steps.title: Incident Response Basics
steps.description: Learn the fundamentals of incident handling and response.

steps.title: Forensics Techniques
steps.description: Acquire skills in disk and memory forensics.

steps.title: Advanced Analysis
steps.description: Reverse engineer malware and build advanced playbooks.

name: Threat Intelligence
description: Gather and analyze threat data to inform security decisions.

steps.title: OSINT and Basics
steps.description: Start with open-source intelligence and core concepts.

steps.title: IOC and Framework Analysis
steps.description: Analyze indicators and use frameworks like MITRE ATT&CK.

steps.title: Malware and Advanced Intel
steps.description: Dive into malware analysis for threat insights.

name: DevSecOps Engineer
description: Integrate security into DevOps pipelines for secure development.

steps.title: Foundational DevOps
steps.description: Learn Linux, networking, and container basics.

steps.title: Pipeline and Orchestration
steps.description: Build CI/CD pipelines and manage Kubernetes.

steps.title: Security Integration
steps.description: Implement SAST/DAST and full DevSecOps practices.

name: Red Team (Advanced)
description: Advanced offensive techniques for red team operations.

steps.title: Advanced Foundations
steps.description: Strengthen networking and OS skills for red teaming.

steps.title: Domain and Privilege Attacks
steps.description: Target Active Directory and escalate privileges.

steps.title: Evasion and Operations
steps.description: Bypass defenses and conduct full red team engagements.
